name: Warehouse Nightshift
description:
Description:

Warehouse Nightshift is a first person horror, which takes place in a charity shop's warehouse, within the future.

You play as the warehouse worker, getting items from the back warehouse, to which the items will then be placed on the store shelves. Its a common occurrence to hear sounds in the warehouse, but today things feel more active, the warehouse worker seems to not want to leave, why does he have such motivation to continue his work. 

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

P - Settings

Shift - Sprint

Ctrl - Crouch

Scroll Wheel - FoV

*Note* the web build has some issues, download is recommended.
